column4: this "start" button, is it the same button you use to "shut down" windows? :)
exactly, I can't understand the logic....that's why on my windows box ive made "shutdown" icons on the desktop...much more sensible
when i last had a windows machine (win98) i found a way to crack explorer.exe so i changed it to read "Snarf"
yeah, resource hacks are always fun
